item.description: Sidebar: This post was originally on Medium before I brought some needed organisation into my life. It is a rant and from a dark past, I’ll leave it at that. This is me, with an ominous hand over my head. Back then I didnâ€™t know the many meanings of shit that I do today. I was born in Dubai, though not my homeland it was home for me. I didnâ€™t have anyÂ relativesÂ per say there as the bulk of the family lived in Pakistan; the motherland.
